entry.title: Operations Engineer for Mozilla
entry.summary:
Think you can handle root@mozilla? Know your way around Linux and application deployment strategies better than your own house? Is it your mission to help deliver the best user experience possible for the most widely-used open source applications in the world?

Read more here: http://hire.jobvite.com/Jobvite/job.aspx?j=oWQRWfwj&b=nuS25jwh
